milestone_behavior: Opens and closes mouth in response to food stimulus
response: My child always opens their mouth when they see the spoon coming. They recognize it's time to eat.
My child has good coordination of sucking and swallowing when drinking from a bottle or cup.

milestone_behavior: Sucks finger when placed between the lips
response: My child easily brings hands and toys to their mouth and explores objects this way.

milestone_behavior: uses palm and fingers to fill and eat with spoon
response: My child can feed themselves finger foods and is starting to use a spoon with some messiness.
My child smiles back at me when I smile at them. They also smile when they see other family members.
